function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low incidence of reported human infections","Impact":"Underestimation of the true extent of the viral diseases in the community","Mitigation":"Increased testing and surveillance to capture mild, subclinical, or asymptomatic cases","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostic testing methods for early detection","People":"Public health officials, healthcare providers, and the general population","Owner":"Public health authorities and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"High number of active cases contributing to virus circulation","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and sustained transmission within the community","Mitigation":"Quarantine measures, contact tracing, and public health interventions to reduce virus transmission","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, epidemiological modeling tools","People":"Public health officials, healthcare providers, and the general population","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Detection of viral RNA in urban wastewaters","Impact":"Indication of ongoing outbreaks and virus circulation in the community, including asymptomatic cases","Mitigation":"Enhanced environmental surveillance and monitoring of sewage systems, public health interventions based on sewage surveillance data","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring tools, sewage testing kits","People":"Public health officials, wastewater management teams","Owner":"Public health authorities and environmental agencies"}]}
